EXTENSIONS ARE NOT ALLOWED FOR THIS BASE! 

To make the gif file you just need to import your finished .PSD to any program that can make GIF like Firealpaca, Photoscape or Photoshop.

*recomended// free software *FIREALPACA GIF 

You can also use Photoshop to create a gif with the frames.
